SENT.plain: Incomplete Reiter's syndrome (ICRS) and incomplete BehÃ§et's disease (ICBD) have many similar clinical features, making the diagnosis difficult
The association of RS and BD with different HL-A antigens is a help in differentiating between the two diseases
Eight patients with incomplete rheumatic syndrome are described
The results of HL-A typing suggest that five patients had incomplete RS and the other three incomplete BD
The value of tissue typing in the correct diagnosis of incomplete rheumatic syndrome is stressed
